oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
General Groves holds his first press conference
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of men and two women sit or stand around a table. Three men and one woman wear military uniforms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Interiors; Military uniforms; Press conferences; Soldiers; Uniforms

Adams, Virgil; Dobbs, George; Fell, Philip; Filippi, Catherine; Gates, Frances S.; Gehman, Richard B.; Groves, Leslie R., 1896-1970; Howard, Lafitte; Marsden, Earl H.; Miller, Loye; Smith, Edward B.; Stern, Daniel K.; Wells, Horace V.; Yarbrough, Willard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of September 6, 1945. Left to right, around the table, Horace V. Wells, Clinton Courier News; Virgil Adams, Lenoir City News; General Groves; Lt. Philip Fell; Col. Earl H. Marsden; George Dobbs, TEC Bulletin; Frances S. Gates, Oak Ridge Journal; Edward B. Smith, Knoxville News-Sentinel; Lafitte Howard, AP; Loye Miller, and (back to camera) Willard Yarbrough, News-Sentinel. In background, Lt. Catherine Filippi; Richard B. Gehman, Oak Ridge Journal and Daniel K. Stern, Knoxville Journal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
